title: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
description: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.
OB:
When performing the following steps: 
1. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog. 
2. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. 

Expected behavior is that the contents of the window should be replaced immediately with the original. However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original.
EB: The contents of the window should be replaced immediately with the original when selecting 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor after answering 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog and reopening the file in the navigator.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Answer 'no' to the 'do you want to save changes' dialog. 
2. Double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. 
3. Repeat steps 1) and 2). 
4. Select 'Revert' from the pop-up menu in the editor.
